about_the_game:
Gameplay

You walk. Then you jump. And then you fall. You throw the rock. It too, falls. But then you get back up to do it all over again and again.

KEY FEATURES


  • Tough but VERY addictive gameplay
  • Evolving environment - fall back to the previous locations over and over again - discovering something new every time
  • Failure is progress
  • Anywhere between 10 and ∞ hours of gameplay
  • Countless distinct locations
  • Optional quests
  • You can throw goats and chickens around
  • Flick your mouse and dunk
  • 2.5 endings
  • makes you feel like Sisyphus

What is SoS?


Salvation of Sisyphus is a punishing, foddian, climbing (and mostly falling) platformer where your only friend is a pet rock and where failure leads to change. Flick the rock with accuracy. Catch it in the air so it does not fall down. Be careful not to fall yourself.
As you progress through this game, you will be able to find your inner peace by embracing negative emotions such as your rage and resentment towards the developer of this frustrating adventure!

MAY SALVATION COME!

short_description: In this high-stakes, foddian platformer you can finally find out if Sisyphus is happy after all. Equipped with only your pet rock, suffer trials and tribulations - come out a changed person. Join Sisyphus on his journey to salvation and reach the top together! What awaits him there is incredible...
